entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending overnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then rising. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
